description: Update Teletrac Navman vehicle trailer or tractor assignments.
permissions: Admin users can update Teletrac Navman vehicle assignments; non-admin users can update vehicles for brokers where they are members (scope limited to broker membership).
side_effects: Updates Teletrac Navman vehicle tractor and/or trailer relationships, including clearing assignments when provided an empty string.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (Teletrac Navman vehicle ID). At least one of --tractor or --trailer must be provided; empty string clears the corresponding assignment.

flags.name: --tractor
flags.description: Tractor ID (use empty string to clear). Example: --tractor 456.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.description: Trailer ID (use empty string to clear). Example: --trailer 789 or --trailer "".
